com.sensorstack.devicelayer

Class DeviceLayerClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensorstack.devicelayer.DeviceLayerClass

  • public class DeviceLayerClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class facilitates data exchange between the android device and sensor hardware over a dedicated channel created during the connection establishment phase. Connection establishment phase must have been completed before any actual data transfer.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        public static boolean isAvailable(Context context,
                  int mode)
                           throws ModeNotSupportedException
        Check if specified mode of connectivity is supported by the android device
        Parameters:
        context - Context of app
        mode - Mode of connectivity with the sensor hardware
        Returns:
        true if specified mode of connectivity is supported by the android device, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ModeNotSupportedException

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected()

      • getDiscretePacket

        public static java.lang.String getDiscretePacket(byte requestByte,
                                 int timeout)
                                          throws NoDeviceConnectedException
        Fetches a response packet from the hardware within a timeout period for multiple discrete sensors
        Parameters:
        requestByte - Request byte sent to the hardware specifying the kind of data requested
        timeout - Timeout period in milliseconds
        Returns:
        Response packet received from the sensor hardware
        Throws:
        NoDeviceConnectedException

      • getContinuousPacket

        public static java.lang.String[] getContinuousPacket(byte start,
                                     byte stop,
                                     java.lang.String stopAck,
                                     int numLines,
                                     int timeout)
                                              throws NoDeviceConnectedException
        Fetches a response stream from the hardware within a timeout period for particular continuous data sensor
        Parameters:
        start - Request byte sent to the hardware requesting to start streaming data of the specified sensor
        stop - Byte sent to the hardware requesting it to stop streaming
        stopAck - Byte received from hardware as an acknowledgement to the stop byte
        numLines - Specifies the length of data buffer
        timeout - Timeout period in milliseconds
        Returns:
        Response buffer received from the sensor hardware
        Throws:
        NoDeviceConnectedException
